Translations.Text: Niscaya amara kura'ana nayila karechi [1] ‘la'ilatula kadare’
Se rate phiristagana o ruh nayila haya [1] tadera rabera anumatikrame sakala sid'dhanta [2] niye
Santimaya [1] se rata, phajarera abirbhaba paryanta
Ahale kitabadera madhye yara kuphari kareche ebam musarikara [1], tara nibrtta habe na yataksana na tadera kache suspasta pramana asabe [2]—
allahara kacha theke eka rasula, yini tela'oyata karena pabitra patrasamuha
Ara yaderake kitaba deya hayechila tara to bibhakta hala tadera kache suspasta pramana asara para
Ara taderake kebala e nirdesa'i pradana kara hayechila ye, tara yena allahara ibadata kare tamra'i jan'ya dinake ekanistha kare ebam salata kayema kare o yakata pradana kare. Ara eta'i sathika dina
Niscaya kitabidera madhye yara kuphari kareche tara ebam musarikara jahannamera agune sthayibhabe abasthana karabe; tara'i srstira adhama
Niscaya yara imana eneche ebam satkaja kareche, tara'i srstira sraestha
